list_of_reviews.review_title: The worst support ever!
list_of_reviews.review: The worst support ever!P2P transaction was failed and they blocked my withdrawals. Its almost one month that I am waiting and the customer service sent me an email that we are busy and you need to wait!! How long can a customer in crypto world wait and see?? I am with Kucoin for almost 2 years now but now I really understand what people say about not trusting them.

list_of_reviews.review_title: KuCoin stole all my NEBL token
list_of_reviews.review: KuCoin stole all my NEBL token. Of course they say they delisted them, but I never received an e-mail. NEBL token don't just disappear 'magically' from your exchange wallet. So either they are still there or you sold them. Either way there is still my money around and you could either send me the token to my external wallet or send me the US$ or BTC which you received from selling. But till now they seem to not be willing to do anything to compensate me. This is stealing. Avoid this exchange!

list_of_reviews.review_title: SCAM, as asking for trade pasword you never set up
list_of_reviews.review: I am not able to withdraw even very litle amount as I do not have trade pin/pasword...really >?Wait but I never set up any trade pasword or PIN, only login pasword. But for deposit they didnt asked any pin, neither set up neiter crate any trade pasword.But to withdraw SURE you dont have paswords you never set up ...THATS just a sheer SCAM

list_of_reviews.review_title: The worst support ever
list_of_reviews.review: The worst support ever! Case: P2P order closed while I was transferring the fiat payment to merchant. When I returned to the order, it was closed and I couldn't approve my fiat money transferring. I contacted with merchant and she has approved she's got my money on her bank account. The support suggested to the merchant to send back fiat money to me, but merchant couldn't do this because of bank transaction restriction. The only way to solve this was to release crypto from her account to my. The merchant told that kucoin has internal ID for this type of transaction and that she already did such operation and it takes about 30 minutes. After that support asked the merchant to prepare certain USDT amount on her account and just disappeared! I've been waiting 3 days and nobody can tell me why it takes so long! Both of sides have agreement, the merchant account is blocked, crypto is frozen. The only thing they has to do – to send blocked crypto to me! Also they blocked me in their telegram group once I started to claim there :(

list_of_reviews.review_title: Worst customer service ever
list_of_reviews.review: Worst customer service ever. I signed up to trade on KuCoin mid January 2024. I’ve inquired about my verification status numerous times. Each time I get the same response. “Your documents have been well received …”Blah blah blah. Pretty they have bots responding automatically. We’re now mid April and my status has not changed nor have they responded any differently. Ridiculous. I have given up at this point.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Can I ask for a lawyer to take kucoin…
list_of_reviews.review: Can I ask for a lawyer to take kucoin in court? Because are useless and full off incompetent that make money on your money.  That way they bloked our accounts.RUN RUN RUN

list_of_reviews.review_title: Watch out from Trading bots; they may not exactly do what you expect...
list_of_reviews.review: Been a user of KuCoin for a long time, unfortunately I am starting to doubt the reliability of the future's bot. I had a VRA entry of 0.0073 and set the tp to 0.008222; the service indicates it was tp'd, however, the price never reached that area and my bot was closed; It happened 3 times already with similar issues and customer service is not being very useful or knowing how to help. Bot ID: 1452428525692232

list_of_reviews.review_title: Refused sign in
list_of_reviews.review: I have moved to another country and sent an email to kucoin support so I can send in my new ID for verification and yet they now REFUSED me from signing into my account and showed "verification failed or expired".Are you becoming like FTX now?? So poor that you need to steal and right out scamming?

list_of_reviews.review_title: They haven't done strax swaps for 20…
list_of_reviews.review: They haven't done strax swaps for 20 days, complete disrespect for their clients. In the telegram group they feed you breakfast, but in the Russian-speaking group they simply ban you for asking questions about the strax swap.

list_of_reviews.review_title: P2p dispute for about 18 days now
list_of_reviews.review: P2p dispute for about 18 days now,  they refuse  to release  my coin. I regret  ever trying on kucoun.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Worst customer service ever
list_of_reviews.review: Worst customer service ever.  P2p order is in appeal for 48 hours and nothing been done.  Chat service is ignoring me now

list_of_reviews.review_title: A frustrating mess
list_of_reviews.review: A frustrating mess. The simple things, a list of all profits/losses is extremely difficult. Ive been using Trading View for a while now, theres a reason everyone bangs on about how good it is. Avoid Kucoin if you can. Im in the Telegram support channle and theyre about as useless as the App

list_of_reviews.review_title: Kucoin is known for deceiving users and…
list_of_reviews.review: Kucoin is known for deceiving users and supporting fraud online activity...

list_of_reviews.review_title: Don't trust KuCoin with your funds!
list_of_reviews.review: I have been using KuCoin for a couple of year and thought they where a reliable marketplace, but unfortunately they are not.I did not login to my account for nearly a year during the bear market, but when I did I found that one of my main assets (FKX) were missing from my account. Apparently KuCoin decided to delist FKX, but did not feel the need to contact me about it to let me know. Instead they only made an announcement on their own website and after I did not withdrew my assets within their timespan, they claimed that I had forfeited the funds and took them for them selves. It would have taken just one text, email or phone call and I would have withdrawn the funds immediately. They know exactly how to reach you if they have a new listing or promotion, but when they decide to delist a token then they suddenly don't have your contact information available.I can only guess the reason behind this, but if you think of it than is does make a great business model to 'steal' the funds of the people that trusted you to safely hold them. Please be warned and watch out with whom you do business. There are more reliable marketplaces out there!#StaySafe #Frauds

list_of_reviews.review_title: Avoid this exchange please. Very dodgy..
list_of_reviews.review: Worst customer service I’ve ever encountered. I genuinely think this exchange is run by children. So unprofessional. Emails never answered, chat is with robotic answers and legally they don’t provide information you should know as investors. Please please avoid

list_of_reviews.review_title: Tried two times to send fiat money to…
list_of_reviews.review: Tried two times to send fiat money to my new account. Two times it was denied by kucoin. There was absolutely no information by kucoin why they didn't accept the money and sent it back. Customer agents in chat have no information and also can't offer any help. First customer agent said pls send less money. Result:also unsuccessful. Second time - within 24hours an expert will contact you. Result: no help - no contact. The customer service is TERRIBLE!!!!!!!!!

list_of_reviews.review_title: Becareful people kucoin exchange…
list_of_reviews.review: Becareful people kucoin exchange cheated me and stole all my money ,it manipulated on my account after i had deposited amount of Usdt then i tried to buy crypto on spot trading ,i found my balance not exist nor i could buy any crypto ! It's very awful and bad experience ever in exchange world! Not recommended to anyone!

list_of_reviews.review_title: Stay away
list_of_reviews.review: Stay away. Customer Service is joke . Worst CS experience I ever had. Incompetent of fixing issues. Their ability seem limited to advising you how to solve it your self. Imagine one day you have an issue and you can not fix. My issue was that the isolated margin borrow & repay transaction history export did not include transactions. Could not file my taxes right.

list_of_reviews.review_title: I like it
list_of_reviews.review: Ive been using kucoin for a long time to trade low cap crypto coins. It works just fine. Its a little bit more expensive to use than binance but I like it very good.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Just f****** fantastic!!!
list_of_reviews.review: Just f****** fantastic!!!! KuCoin has grown on me hard and I am kicking myself for leaving it until now, to fully immerse my time in the experience KuCoin has to offer. All the parts that are enjoyed amongst different exchanges, have been brought together for a more complete trading platform. No issues for me thus far... The challenging thing though is to navigate your way through the fully loaded platform which takes some time. Effort + Efficiency = $$$$$$Keep it up there humans!!! Please don't be in the news soon with legal issues. My heart will be broken.

list_of_reviews.review_title: No major problem in 2 years
list_of_reviews.review: I'm using this exchange for 2 years now (beside others). There was no problem during that time.The only drawback i experienced, the spam emails. I asked the customer support to stop sending any kind of marketing email to me. They suggested that I should mark them as spam, because there is no option to opt-out. No other experience with customer support.

prompts_output.Prompt: Considering the review title and content: Contrast the topics mentioned in positive reviews with those mentioned in negative reviews to determine key differentiators in user experiences. Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: Positive reviews praise successful trades and fast withdrawals, while negative reviews criticize account closures, poor service, and tech glitches, highlighting reliability and support as key differentiators in user satisfaction.

prompts_output.Prompt: Considering the review title and content: Analyze mentions of customer support interactions in the reviews to gauge the effectiveness and responsiveness of the kucoin.com support team. Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: I don't have specific reviews or information on Kucoin.com's customer support interactions to analyze, so I cannot gauge the effectiveness or responsiveness of their support team.

prompts_output.Prompt: Considering the review title and content: Based on the review sentiments and contents, predict potential future issues kucoin.com might face or areas where they could improve. Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.

However, like other exchanges, they could benefit from focusing on customer service, transparent policies, and swift technical issue resolution to prevent common user dissatisfaction themes.

overall_prompt_summary: Based on the context provided, the company in question has received a range of reviews, indicating a polarized customer experience. Key themes from positive reviews highlight successful trading experiences and efficient withdrawal processes. Conversely, critical issues raised in negative reviews focus on account closures without clear explanations, subpar customer service, and technical difficulties encountered by users. These negative aspects suggest areas for potential improvement, particularly in enhancing customer support and ensuring transparency in account management practices. Further investigation might be warranted to address the underlying causes of technical problems and to reconcile the contrasting experiences to improve overall user satisfaction.
